Documentation
Table of Contents

Codeunit DESCryptoServiceProvider

ID 1379
Namespace: System.Security.Encryption

Provides helper functions for the Data Encryption Standard (DES)

Properties

Name Value
Access Public
InherentEntitlements X
InherentPermissions X

Methods

EncryptText

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 24.0. Use EncryptText with SecretText data type for Password.

Encrypts text with DotNet Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider

[NonDebuggable]
[Obsolete(Use EncryptText with SecretText data type for Password.,24.0)]
procedure EncryptText(DecryptedText: Text, Password: Text, Salt: Text): Text

Parameters

Name Type Description
DecryptedText Text

Represents the text to encrypt
Password Text

Represents the password to be used to initialize a new instance of DotNet System.Security.Cryptography.Rfc2898DeriveBytes
Salt Text

Represents the salt to be used to initialize a new instance of System.Security.Cryptography.Rfc2898DeriveBytes

Returns

Type Description
Text

Returns the encrypted text

DecryptText

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 24.0. Use DecryptText with SecretText data type for Password.

Decrypts text with DotNet Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider

[NonDebuggable]
[Obsolete(Use DecryptText with SecretText data type for Password.,24.0)]
procedure DecryptText(EncryptedText: Text, Password: Text, Salt: Text): Text

Parameters

Name Type Description
EncryptedText Text

Represents the text to decrypt
Password Text

Represents the password to be used to initialize a new instance of DotNet System.Security.Cryptography.Rfc2898DeriveBytes
Salt Text

Represents the salt to be used to initialize a new instance of System.Security.Cryptography.Rfc2898DeriveBytes

Returns

Type Description
Text

Returns the decrypted text

EncryptStream

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 24.0. Use EncryptStream with SecretText data type for Password.

Encrypts data in stream with DotNet Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider

[NonDebuggable]
[Obsolete(Use EncryptStream with SecretText data type for Password.,24.0)]
procedure EncryptStream(Password: Text, Salt: Text, InputInstream: InStream, var OutputOutstream: OutStream)

Parameters

Name Type Description
Password Text

Represents the password to be used to initialize a new instance of Rfc2898DeriveBytes
Salt Text

Represents the salt to be used to initialize a new instance of System.Security.Cryptography.Rfc2898DeriveBytes
InputInstream InStream

Represents the input instream data to encrypt
OutputOutstream OutStream

Represents the output instream encrypted data

DecryptStream

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 24.0. Use DecryptStream with SecretText data type for Password.

Decrypts data in stream with DotNet Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider

[NonDebuggable]
[Obsolete(Use DecryptStream with SecretText data type for Password.,24.0)]
procedure DecryptStream(Password: Text, Salt: Text, InputInstream: InStream, var OutputOutstream: OutStream)

Parameters

Name Type Description
Password Text

Represents the password to be used to initialize a new instance of Rfc2898DeriveBytes
Salt Text

Represents the salt to be used to initialize a new instance of System.Security.Cryptography.Rfc2898DeriveBytes
InputInstream InStream

Represents the input instream data to decrypt
OutputOutstream OutStream

Represents the output instream decrypted data
